caption:
❤️‍🩹 Cellular Hydration Barrier Repair Serum vs. Heartleaf Gentle Resurfacing Serum. Which serum is right for you? 
.
➡️ If your skin is normally balanced but currently sensitive because you've overdone it with active ingredients, turn to Cellular Hydration Repair Serum to bring your skin barrier back into balance.
.
➡️ If your skin is chronically sensitive, our Heartleaf Gentle Resurfacing Serum is for you. The ultra-gentle formula delicately resurfaces skin without triggering inflammation or irritation.
.
Available now on murad.com. Coming soon to @ultabeauty online on 11/17 and in stores on 12/1.
